Word Swap¶

class transformations.word_swap.WordSwap(replace_stopwords=False)[source]¶

An abstract class that takes a sentence and transforms it by replacing some of its words.

Other classes can achieve this by inheriting from WordSwap and overriding self._get_replacement_words.

Parameters

replace_stopwords (bool, optional) – Whether to replace stopwords. Defaults to False.

class transformations.word_swap_counterfit.WordSwapCounterfit(replace_stopwords=False, max_candidates=None, word_embedding_folder='paragram_300_sl999')[source]¶

Transforms an input by replacing its words with synonyms in the counter-fitted embedding space.

Parameters

  • replace_stopwords (bool, optional) – Whether to replace the stopwords in the text. Defaults to False.

  • max_candidates (int, optional) – The default number of words to replace. Defaults to None.

  • word_embedding_folder (str, optional) – The path to the word_embedding folder. Defaults to paragram_300_sl999

Raises

ValueError – If the word_embedding_folder is not found.
